cards.task: Whoever owns an iPhone  has to drink.

Everyone votes on who has to drink next.

The last person who claps their hands has to drink.

Those who wear glasses or contact lenses drink.
Shakespeare wannabes: Pick a word. The next player needs to find a word that rhymes with yours. The first person to fail drinks.
Switch t-shirt with the previous player. If one of you denies to do so or it's not possible, you drink.
